short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Become the best corn farmer in the world! Click on the corn, earn money and buy upgrades to dominate the entire market.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Corn Clicker is a game in which you can become a virtual corn farmer. Click, earn money, buy upgrades and dominate the entire market.
